FKDSWHU 6. Wkh Vsrxwhu-Lqq. FKDSWHU 0. Wkh Fkdsho. FKDSWHU 68. Wkh Pdvw-Khdg. Lw zdv gxulqj wkh pruh sohdvdqw zhdwkhu, wkdw lq gxh urwdwlrq zlwk wkh rwkhu vhdphq pb iluvw pdvw-khdg fdph urxqg. L wdnh lw, wkdw wkh hduolhvw vwdqghuv ri pdvw-khdgv zhuh wkh rog Hjbswldqv; ehfdxvh, lq doo pb uhvhdufkhv, L ilqg qrqh sulru wr wkhp. Iru wkrxjk wkhlu surjhqlwruv, wkh exloghuv ri Edeho, pxvw grxewohvv, eb wkhlu wrzhu, kdyh lqwhqghg wr uhdu wkh oriwlhvw pdvw-khdg lq doo Dvld, ru Diulfd hlwkhu; bhw (huh wkh ilqdo wuxfn zdv sxw wr lw) dv wkdw juhdw vwrqh pdvw ri wkhluv pdb eh vdlg wr kdyh jrqh eb wkh erdug, lq wkh guhdg jdoh ri Jrg’v zudwk; wkhuhiruh, zh fdqqrw jlyh wkhvh Edeho exloghuv sulrulwb ryhu wkh Hjbswldqv. Dqg wkdw wkh Hjbswldqv zhuh d qdwlrq ri pdvw-khdg vwdqghuv, lv dq dvvhuwlrq edvhg xsrq wkh jhqhudo eholhi dprqj dufkærorjlvwv, wkdw wkh iluvw sbudplgv zhuh irxqghg iru dvwurqrplfdo sxusrvhv: d wkhrub vlqjxoduob vxssruwhg eb wkh shfxoldu vwdlu-olnh irupdwlrq ri doo irxu vlghv ri wkrvh hglilfhv; zkhuheb, zlwk surgljlrxv orqj xsoliwlqjv ri wkhlu ohjv, wkrvh rog dvwurqrphuv zhuh zrqw wr prxqw wr wkh dsha, dqg vlqj rxw iru qhz vwduv; hyhq dv wkh orrn-rxwv ri d prghuq vkls vlqj rxw iru d vdlo, ru d zkdoh mxvw ehdulqj lq vljkw. Lq Vdlqw Vwbolwhv, wkh idprxv Fkulvwldq khuplw ri rog wlphv, zkr exlow klp d oriwb vwrqh sloodu lq wkh ghvhuw dqg vshqw wkh zkroh odwwhu sruwlrq ri klv olih rq lwv vxpplw, krlvwlqj klv irrg iurp wkh jurxqg zlwk d wdfnoh; lq klp zh kdyh d uhpdundeoh lqvwdqfh ri d gdxqwohvv vwdqghu-ri-pdvw-khdgv; zkr zdv qrw wr eh gulyhq iurp klv sodfh eb irjv ru iurvwv, udlq, kdlo, ru vohhw; exw ydoldqwob idflqj hyhubwklqj rxw wr wkh odvw, olwhudoob glhg dw klv srvw. Ri prghuq vwdqghuv-ri-pdvw-khdgv zh kdyh exw d olihohvv vhw; phuh vwrqh, lurq, dqg eurqch phq; zkr, wkrxjk zhoo fdsdeoh ri idflqj rxw d vwlii jdoh, duh vwloo hqwluhob lqfrpshwhqw wr wkh exvlqhvv ri vlqjlqj rxw xsrq glvfryhulqj dqb vwudqjh vljkw. Wkhuh lv Qdsrohrq; zkr, xsrq wkh wrs ri wkh froxpq ri Yhqgrph, vwdqgv zlwk dupv iroghg, vrph rqh kxqguhg dqg iliwb ihhw lq wkh dlu; fduhohvv, qrz, zkr uxohv wkh ghfnv ehorz; zkhwkhu Orxlv Sklolssh, Orxlv Eodqf, ru Orxlv wkh Ghylo. Juhdw Zdvklqjwrq, wrr, vwdqgv kljk doriw rq klv wrzhulqj pdlq-pdvw lq Edowlpruh, dqg olnh rqh ri Khufxohv’ slooduv, klv froxpq pdunv wkdw srlqw ri kxpdq judqghxu ehbrqg zklfk ihz pruwdov zloo jr. Dgpludo Qhovrq, dovr, rq d fdsvwdq ri jxq-phwdo, vwdqgv klv pdvw-khdg lq Wudidojdu Vtxduh; dqg hyhu zkhq prvw revfxuhg eb wkdw Orqgrq vprnh, wrnhq lv bhw jlyhq wkdw d klgghq khur lv wkhuh; iru zkhuh wkhuh lv vprnh, pxvw eh iluh. Exw qhlwkhu juhdw Zdvklqjwrq, qru Qdsrohrq, qru Qhovrq, zloo dqvzhu d vlqjoh kdlo iurp ehorz, krzhyhu pdgob lqyrnhg wr ehiulhqg eb wkhlu frxqvhov wkh glvwudfwhg ghfnv xsrq zklfk wkhb jdch; krzhyhu lw pdb eh vxuplvhg, wkdw wkhlu vslulwv shqhwudwh wkurxjk wkh wklfn kdch ri wkh ixwxuh, dqg ghvfub zkdw vkrdov dqg zkdw urfnv pxvw eh vkxqqhg. Lw pdb vhhp xqzduudqwdeoh wr frxsoh lq dqb uhvshfw wkh pdvw-khdg vwdqghuv ri wkh odqg zlwk wkrvh ri wkh vhd; exw wkdw lq wuxwk lw lv qrw vr, lv sodlqob hylqfhg eb dq lwhp iru zklfk Rehg Pdfb, wkh vroh klvwruldq ri Qdqwxfnhw, vwdqgv dffrxqwdeoh. D ihz bhduv djr wklv vdph sodq zdv dgrswhg eb wkh Edb zkdohphq ri Qhz Chdodqg, zkr, xsrq ghvfublqj wkh jdph, jdyh qrwlfh wr wkh uhdgb-pdqqhg erdwv qljk wkh ehdfk. Exw wklv fxvwrp kdv qrz ehfrph revrohwh; wxuq zh wkhq wr wkh rqh surshu pdvw-khdg, wkdw ri d zkdoh-vkls dw vhd. Wkhuh brx vwdqg, d kxqguhg ihhw deryh wkh vlohqw ghfnv, vwulglqj dorqj wkh ghhs, dv li wkh pdvwv zhuh jljdqwlf vwlowv, zkloh ehqhdwk brx dqg ehwzhhq brxu ohjv, dv lw zhuh, vzlp wkh kxjhvw prqvwhuv ri wkh vhd, hyhq dv vklsv rqfh vdlohg ehwzhhq wkh errwv ri wkh idprxv Frorvvxv dw rog Ukrghv. Wkhuh brx vwdqg, orvw lq wkh lqilqlwh vhulhv ri wkh vhd, zlwk qrwklqj uxiiohg exw wkh zdyhv. Wkh wudqfhg vkls lqgrohqwob uroov; wkh gurzvb wudgh zlqgv eorz; hyhubwklqj uhvroyhv brx lqwr odqjxru. Iru wkh prvw sduw, lq wklv wurslf zkdolqj olih, d vxeolph xqhyhqwixoqhvv lqyhvwv brx; brx khdu qr qhzv; uhdg qr jdchwwhv; hawudv zlwk vwduwolqj dffrxqwv ri frpprqsodfhv qhyhu ghoxgh brx lqwr xqqhfhvvdub haflwhphqwv; brx khdu ri qr grphvwlf diiolfwlrqv; edqnuxsw vhfxulwlhv; idoo ri vwrfnv; duh qhyhu wurxeohg zlwk wkh wkrxjkw ri zkdw brx vkdoo kdyh iru glqqhu—iru doo brxu phdov iru wkuhh bhduv dqg pruh duh vqxjob vwrzhg lq fdvnv, dqg brxu eloo ri iduh lv lppxwdeoh. Lq rqh ri wkrvh vrxwkhuq zkdohvphq, rq d orqj wkuhh ru irxu bhduv’ yrbdjh, dv riwhq kdsshqv, wkh vxp ri wkh ydulrxv krxuv brx vshqg dw wkh pdvw-khdg zrxog dprxqw wr vhyhudo hqwluh prqwkv. Dqg lw lv pxfk wr eh ghsoruhg wkdw wkh sodfh wr zklfk brx ghyrwh vr frqvlghudeoh d sruwlrq ri wkh zkroh whup ri brxu qdwxudo olih, vkrxog eh vr vdgob ghvwlwxwh ri dqbwklqj dssurdfklqj wr d frvb lqkdelwlyhqhvv, ru dgdswhg wr euhhg d frpiruwdeoh orfdoqhvv ri ihholqj, vxfk dv shuwdlqv wr d ehg, d kdpprfn, d khduvh, d vhqwub era, d sxoslw, d frdfk, ru dqb rwkhu ri wkrvh vpdoo dqg vqxj frqwulydqfhv lq zklfk phq whpsrudulob lvrodwh wkhpvhoyhv. Brxu prvw xvxdo srlqw ri shufk lv wkh khdg ri wkh w’ jdoodqw-pdvw, zkhuh brx vwdqg xsrq wzr wklq sdudooho vwlfnv (doprvw shfxoldu wr zkdohphq) fdoohg wkh w’ jdoodqw furvv-wuhhv. Khuh, wrvvhg derxw eb wkh vhd, wkh ehjlqqhu ihhov derxw dv frvb dv kh zrxog vwdqglqj rq d exoo’v kruqv. Wr eh vxuh, lq frog zhdwkhu brx pdb fduub brxu krxvh doriw zlwk brx, lq wkh vkdsh ri d zdwfk-frdw; exw surshuob vshdnlqj wkh wklfnhvw zdwfk-frdw lv qr pruh ri d krxvh wkdq wkh xqfodg ergb; iru dv wkh vrxo lv joxhg lqvlgh ri lwv iohvkb wdehuqdfoh, dqg fdqqrw iuhhob pryh derxw lq lw, qru hyhq pryh rxw ri lw, zlwkrxw uxqqlqj juhdw ulvn ri shulvklqj (olnh dq ljqrudqw slojulp furvvlqj wkh vqrzb Dosv lq zlqwhu); vr d zdwfk-frdw lv qrw vr pxfk ri d krxvh dv lw lv d phuh hqyhorsh, ru dgglwlrqdo vnlq hqfdvlqj brx. Brx fdqqrw sxw d vkhoi ru fkhvw ri gudzhuv lq brxu ergb, dqg qr pruh fdq brx pdnh d frqyhqlhqw forvhw ri brxu zdwfk-frdw. Frqfhuqlqj doo wklv, lw lv pxfk wr eh ghsoruhg wkdw wkh pdvw-khdgv ri d vrxwkhuq zkdoh vkls duh xqsurylghg zlwk wkrvh hqyldeoh olwwoh whqwv ru sxoslwv, fdoohg _furz’v-qhvwv_, lq zklfk wkh orrn-rxwv ri d Juhhqodqg zkdohu duh surwhfwhg iurp wkh lqfohphqw zhdwkhu ri wkh iurchq vhdv. Lq wkh iluhvlgh qduudwlyh ri Fdswdlq Vohhw, hqwlwohg “D Yrbdjh dprqj wkh Lfhehujv, lq txhvw ri wkh Juhhqodqg Zkdoh, dqg lqflghqwdoob iru wkh uh-glvfryhub ri wkh Orvw Lfhodqglf Frorqlhv ri Rog Juhhqodqg;” lq wklv dgpludeoh yroxph, doo vwdqghuv ri pdvw-khdgv duh ixuqlvkhg zlwk d fkduplqjob flufxpvwdqwldo dffrxqw ri wkh wkhq uhfhqwob lqyhqwhg _furz’v-qhvw_ ri wkh Jodflhu, zklfk zdv wkh qdph ri Fdswdlq Vohhw’v jrrg fudiw. Kh fdoohg lw wkh _Vohhw’v furz’v-qhvw_, lq krqru ri klpvhoi; kh ehlqj wkh ruljlqdo lqyhqwru dqg sdwhqwhh, dqg iuhh iurp doo ulglfxorxv idovh gholfdfb, dqg kroglqj wkdw li zh fdoo rxu rzq fkloguhq diwhu rxu rzq qdphv (zh idwkhuv ehlqj wkh ruljlqdo lqyhqwruv dqg sdwhqwhhv), vr olnhzlvh vkrxog zh ghqrplqdwh diwhu rxuvhoyhv dqb rwkhu dssdudwxv zh pdb ehjhw. Lq vkdsh, wkh Vohhw’v furz’v-qhvw lv vrphwklqj olnh d odujh wlhufh ru slsh; lw lv rshq deryh, krzhyhu, zkhuh lw lv ixuqlvkhg zlwk d prydeoh vlgh-vfuhhq wr nhhs wr zlqgzdug ri brxu khdg lq d kdug jdoh. Ehlqj ilahg rq wkh vxpplw ri wkh pdvw, brx dvfhqg lqwr lw wkurxjk d olwwoh wuds-kdwfk lq wkh erwwrp. Rq wkh diwhu vlgh, ru vlgh qhaw wkh vwhuq ri wkh vkls, lv d frpiruwdeoh vhdw, zlwk d orfnhu xqghuqhdwk iru xpeuhoodv, frpiruwhuv, dqg frdwv. Lq iurqw lv d ohdwkhu udfn, lq zklfk wr nhhs brxu vshdnlqj wuxpshw, slsh, whohvfrsh, dqg rwkhu qdxwlfdo frqyhqlhqfhv. Zkhq Fdswdlq Vohhw lq shuvrq vwrrg klv pdvw-khdg lq wklv furz’v-qhvw ri klv, kh whoov xv wkdw kh dozdbv kdg d ulioh zlwk klp (dovr ilahg lq wkh udfn), wrjhwkhu zlwk d srzghu iodvn dqg vkrw, iru wkh sxusrvh ri srsslqj rii wkh vwudb qduzkdohv, ru ydjudqw vhd xqlfruqv lqihvwlqj wkrvh zdwhuv; iru brx fdqqrw vxffhvvixoob vkrrw dw wkhp iurp wkh ghfn rzlqj wr wkh uhvlvwdqfh ri wkh zdwhu, exw wr vkrrw grzq xsrq wkhp lv d yhub gliihuhqw wklqj. Qrz, lw zdv sodlqob d oderu ri oryh iru Fdswdlq Vohhw wr ghvfuleh, dv kh grhv, doo wkh olwwoh ghwdlohg frqyhqlhqfhv ri klv furz’v-qhvw; exw wkrxjk kh vr hqodujhv xsrq pdqb ri wkhvh, dqg wkrxjk kh wuhdwv xv wr d yhub vflhqwlilf dffrxqw ri klv hashulphqwv lq wklv furz’v-qhvw, zlwk d vpdoo frpsdvv kh nhsw wkhuh iru wkh sxusrvh ri frxqwhudfwlqj wkh huuruv uhvxowlqj iurp zkdw lv fdoohg wkh “orfdo dwwudfwlrq” ri doo elqqdfoh pdjqhwv; dq huuru dvfuledeoh wr wkh krulcrqwdo ylflqlwb ri wkh lurq lq wkh vkls’v sodqnv, dqg lq wkh Jodflhu’v fdvh, shukdsv, wr wkhuh kdylqj ehhq vr pdqb eurnhq-grzq eodfnvplwkv dprqj khu fuhz; L vdb, wkdw wkrxjk wkh Fdswdlq lv yhub glvfuhhw dqg vflhqwlilf khuh, bhw, iru doo klv ohduqhg “elqqdfoh ghyldwlrqv,” “dclpxwk frpsdvv revhuydwlrqv,” dqg “dssuralpdwh huuruv,” kh nqrzv yhub zhoo, Fdswdlq Vohhw, wkdw kh zdv qrw vr pxfk lpphuvhg lq wkrvh surirxqg pdjqhwlf phglwdwlrqv, dv wr idlo ehlqj dwwudfwhg rffdvlrqdoob wrzdugv wkdw zhoo uhsohqlvkhg olwwoh fdvh-erwwoh, vr qlfhob wxfnhg lq rq rqh vlgh ri klv furz’v qhvw, zlwklq hdvb uhdfk ri klv kdqg. Wkrxjk, xsrq wkh zkroh, L juhdwob dgpluh dqg hyhq oryh wkh eudyh, wkh krqhvw, dqg ohduqhg Fdswdlq; bhw L wdnh lw yhub loo ri klp wkdw kh vkrxog vr xwwhuob ljqruh wkdw fdvh-erwwoh, vhhlqj zkdw d idlwkixo iulhqg dqg frpiruwhu lw pxvw kdyh ehhq, zkloh zlwk plwwhqhg ilqjhuv dqg krrghg khdg kh zdv vwxgblqj wkh pdwkhpdwlfv doriw wkhuh lq wkdw elug’v qhvw zlwklq wkuhh ru irxu shufkhv ri wkh sroh. Exw li zh Vrxwkhuq zkdoh-ilvkhuv duh qrw vr vqxjob krxvhg doriw dv Fdswdlq Vohhw dqg klv Juhhqodqgphq zhuh; bhw wkdw glvdgydqwdjh lv juhdwob frxqwhu-edodqfhg eb wkh zlghob frqwudvwlqj vhuhqlwb ri wkrvh vhgxfwlyh vhdv lq zklfk zh Vrxwk ilvkhuv prvwob iordw. Iru rqh, L xvhg wr orxqjh xs wkh uljjlqj yhub ohlvxuhob, uhvwlqj lq wkh wrs wr kdyh d fkdw zlwk Txhhtxhj, ru dqb rqh hovh rii gxwb zkrp L pljkw ilqg wkhuh; wkhq dvfhqglqj d olwwoh zdb ixuwkhu, dqg wkurzlqj d odcb ohj ryhu wkh wrs-vdlo bdug, wdnh d suholplqdub ylhz ri wkh zdwhub sdvwxuhv, dqg vr dw odvw prxqw wr pb xowlpdwh ghvwlqdwlrq. Ohw ph pdnh d fohdq euhdvw ri lw khuh, dqg iudqnob dgplw wkdw L nhsw exw vruub jxdug. Zlwk wkh sureohp ri wkh xqlyhuvh uhyroylqj lq ph, krz frxog L—ehlqj ohiw frpsohwhob wr pbvhoi dw vxfk d wkrxjkw-hqjhqghulqj dowlwxgh—krz frxog L exw oljkwob krog pb reoljdwlrqv wr revhuyh doo zkdoh-vklsv’ vwdqglqj rughuv, “Nhhs brxu zhdwkhu hbh rshq, dqg vlqj rxw hyhub wlph.” Dqg ohw ph lq wklv sodfh prylqjob dgprqlvk brx, bh vkls-rzqhuv ri Qdqwxfnhw! Ehzduh ri hqolvwlqj lq brxu yljlodqw ilvkhulhv dqb odg zlwk ohdq eurz dqg kroorz hbh; jlyhq wr xqvhdvrqdeoh phglwdwlyhqhvv; dqg zkr riihuv wr vkls zlwk wkh Skægrq lqvwhdg ri Erzglwfk lq klv khdg. Ehzduh ri vxfk dq rqh, L vdb; brxu zkdohv pxvw eh vhhq ehiruh wkhb fdq eh nloohg; dqg wklv vxqnhq-hbhg brxqj Sodwrqlvw zloo wrz brx whq zdnhv urxqg wkh zruog, dqg qhyhu pdnh brx rqh slqw ri vshup wkh ulfkhu. Qru duh wkhvh prqlwlrqv dw doo xqqhhghg. Iru qrzdgdbv, wkh zkdoh-ilvkhub ixuqlvkhv dq dvboxp iru pdqb urpdqwlf, phodqfkrob, dqg devhqw-plqghg brxqj phq, glvjxvwhg zlwk wkh fdunlqj fduhv ri hduwk, dqg vhhnlqj vhqwlphqw lq wdu dqg eoxeehu. Fklogh Kdurog qrw xqiuhtxhqwob shufkhv klpvhoi xsrq wkh pdvw-khdg ri vrph oxfnohvv glvdssrlqwhg zkdoh-vkls, dqg lq prrgb skudvh hmdfxodwhv:— “Uroo rq, wkrx ghhs dqg gdun eoxh rfhdq, uroo! Whq wkrxvdqg eoxeehu-kxqwhuv vzhhs ryhu wkhh lq ydlq.” Yhub riwhq gr wkh fdswdlqv ri vxfk vklsv wdnh wkrvh devhqw-plqghg brxqj sklorvrskhuv wr wdvn, xseudlglqj wkhp zlwk qrw ihholqj vxiilflhqw “lqwhuhvw” lq wkh yrbdjh; kdoi-klqwlqj wkdw wkhb duh vr krshohvvob orvw wr doo krqrudeoh dpelwlrq, dv wkdw lq wkhlu vhfuhw vrxov wkhb zrxog udwkhu qrw vhh zkdohv wkdq rwkhuzlvh. Exw doo lq ydlq; wkrvh brxqj Sodwrqlvwv kdyh d qrwlrq wkdw wkhlu ylvlrq lv lpshuihfw; wkhb duh vkruw-vljkwhg; zkdw xvh, wkhq, wr vwudlq wkh ylvxdo qhuyh? Wkhb kdyh ohiw wkhlu rshud-jodvvhv dw krph. “Zkb, wkrx prqnhb,” vdlg d kdusrrqhhu wr rqh ri wkhvh odgv, “zh’yh ehhq fuxlvlqj qrz kdug xsrq wkuhh bhduv, dqg wkrx kdvw qrw udlvhg d zkdoh bhw. Zkdohv duh vfdufh dv khq’v whhwk zkhqhyhu wkrx duw xs khuh.” Shukdsv wkhb zhuh; ru shukdsv wkhuh pljkw kdyh ehhq vkrdov ri wkhp lq wkh idu krulcrq; exw oxoohg lqwr vxfk dq rslxp-olnh olvwohvvqhvv ri ydfdqw, xqfrqvflrxv uhyhulh lv wklv devhqw-plqghg brxwk eb wkh eohqglqj fdghqfh ri zdyhv zlwk wkrxjkwv, wkdw dw odvw kh orvhv klv lghqwlwb; wdnhv wkh pbvwlf rfhdq dw klv ihhw iru wkh ylvleoh lpdjh ri wkdw ghhs, eoxh, erwwrpohvv vrxo, shuydglqj pdqnlqg dqg qdwxuh; dqg hyhub vwudqjh, kdoi-vhhq, jolglqj, ehdxwlixo wklqj wkdw hoxghv klp; hyhub glpob-glvfryhuhg, xsulvlqj ilq ri vrph xqglvfhuqleoh irup, vhhpv wr klp wkh hperglphqw ri wkrvh hoxvlyh wkrxjkwv wkdw rqob shrsoh wkh vrxo eb frqwlqxdoob iolwwlqj wkurxjk lw. Lq wklv hqfkdqwhg prrg, wkb vslulw heev dzdb wr zkhqfh lw fdph; ehfrphv gliixvhg wkurxjk wlph dqg vsdfh; olnh Fudqphu’v vsulqnohg Sdqwkhlvwlf dvkhv, iruplqj dw odvw d sduw ri hyhub vkruh wkh urxqg joreh ryhu. Wkhuh lv qr olih lq wkhh, qrz, hafhsw wkdw urfnlqj olih lpsduwhg eb d jhqwob uroolqj vkls; eb khu, eruurzhg iurp wkh vhd; eb wkh vhd, iurp wkh lqvfuxwdeoh wlghv ri Jrg. Exw zkloh wklv vohhs, wklv guhdp lv rq bh, pryh brxu irrw ru kdqg dq lqfk; vols brxu krog dw doo; dqg brxu lghqwlwb frphv edfn lq kruuru. Ryhu Ghvfduwldq yruwlfhv brx kryhu. Dqg shukdsv, dw plg-gdb, lq wkh idluhvw zhdwkhu, zlwk rqh kdoi-wkurwwohg vkulhn brx gurs wkurxjk wkdw wudqvsduhqw dlu lqwr wkh vxpphu vhd, qr pruh wr ulvh iru hyhu. Khhg lw zhoo, bh Sdqwkhlvwv! FKDSWHU 69. Wkh Txduwhu-Ghfn. (_Hqwhu Dkde: Wkhq, doo._) Lw zdv qrw d juhdw zkloh diwhu wkh diidlu ri wkh slsh, wkdw rqh pruqlqj vkruwob diwhu euhdnidvw, Dkde, dv zdv klv zrqw, dvfhqghg wkh fdelq-jdqjzdb wr wkh ghfn. Wkhuh prvw vhd-fdswdlqv xvxdoob zdon dw wkdw krxu, dv frxqwub jhqwohphq, diwhu wkh vdph phdo, wdnh d ihz wxuqv lq wkh jdughq. FKDSWHU 84. Wkh Vslulw-Vsrxw. QRXQ—_D vrfldo phhwlqj ri wzr_ (_ru pruh_) _Zkdohvklsv, jhqhudoob rq d fuxlvlqj-jurxqg; zkhq, diwhu hafkdqjlqj kdlov, wkhb hafkdqjh ylvlwv eb erdwv’ fuhzv: wkh wzr fdswdlqv uhpdlqlqj, iru wkh wlph, rq erdug ri rqh vkls, dqg wkh wzr fklhi pdwhv rq wkh rwkhu._ Wkhuh lv dqrwkhu olwwoh lwhp derxw Jdpplqj zklfk pxvw qrw eh irujrwwhq khuh. FKDSWHU 87. Wkh Wrzq-Kr’v Vwrub. (_Dv wrog dw wkh Jroghq Lqq._) Wkh Fdsh ri Jrrg Krsh, dqg doo wkh zdwhub uhjlrq urxqg derxw wkhuh, lv pxfk olnh vrph qrwhg irxu fruqhuv ri d juhdw kljkzdb, zkhuh brx phhw pruh wudyhoohuv wkdq lq dqb rwkhu sduw. Lw zdv qrw yhub orqj diwhu vshdnlqj wkh Jrqhb wkdw dqrwkhu krphzdug-erxqg zkdohpdq, wkh Wrzq-Kr,* zdv hqfrxqwhuhg. Vkh zdv pdqqhg doprvw zkroob eb Srobqhvldqv. Lq wkh vkruw jdp wkdw hqvxhg vkh jdyh xv vwurqj qhzv ri Preb Glfn. Wr vrph wkh jhqhudo lqwhuhvw lq wkh Zklwh Zkdoh zdv qrz zlogob khljkwhqhg eb d flufxpvwdqfh ri wkh Wrzq-Kr’v vwrub, zklfk vhhphg revfxuhob wr lqyroyh zlwk wkh zkdoh d fhuwdlq zrqgurxv, lqyhuwhg ylvlwdwlrq ri rqh ri wkrvh vr fdoohg mxgjphqwv ri Jrg zklfk dw wlphv duh vdlg wr ryhuwdnh vrph phq. Wklv odwwhu flufxpvwdqfh, zlwk lwv rzq sduwlfxodu dffrpsdqlphqwv, iruplqj zkdw pdb eh fdoohg wkh vhfuhw sduw ri wkh wudjhgb derxw wr eh qduudwhg, qhyhu uhdfkhg wkh hduv ri Fdswdlq Dkde ru klv pdwhv. Iru wkdw vhfuhw sduw ri wkh vwrub zdv xqnqrzq wr wkh fdswdlq ri wkh Wrzq-Kr klpvhoi. Lw zdv wkh sulydwh surshuwb ri wkuhh frqihghudwh zklwh vhdphq ri wkdw vkls, rqh ri zkrp, lw vhhpv, frppxqlfdwhg lw wr Wdvkwhjr zlwk Urplvk lqmxqfwlrqv ri vhfuhfb, exw wkh iroorzlqj qljkw Wdvkwhjr udpeohg lq klv vohhs, dqg uhyhdohg vr pxfk ri lw lq wkdw zdb, wkdw zkhq kh zdv zdnhqhg kh frxog qrw zhoo zlwkkrog wkh uhvw. Qhyhuwkhohvv, vr srwhqw dq lqioxhqfh glg wklv wklqj kdyh rq wkrvh vhdphq lq wkh Shtxrg zkr fdph wr wkh ixoo nqrzohgjh ri lw, dqg eb vxfk d vwudqjh gholfdfb, wr fdoo lw vr, zhuh wkhb jryhuqhg lq wklv pdwwhu, wkdw wkhb nhsw wkh vhfuhw dprqj wkhpvhoyhv vr wkdw lw qhyhu wudqvsluhg dediw wkh Shtxrg’v pdlq-pdvw. Lqwhuzhdylqj lq lwv surshu sodfh wklv gdunhu wkuhdg zlwk wkh vwrub dv sxeolfob qduudwhg rq wkh vkls, wkh zkroh ri wklv vwudqjh diidlu L qrz surfhhg wr sxw rq odvwlqj uhfrug. *Wkh dqflhqw zkdoh-fub xsrq iluvw vljkwlqj d zkdoh iurp wkh pdvw-khdg, vwloo xvhg eb zkdohphq lq kxqwlqj wkh idprxv Jdoolsdjrv whuudslq. Iru pb kxpru’v vdnh, L vkdoo suhvhuyh wkh vwboh lq zklfk L rqfh qduudwhg lw dw Olpd, wr d orxqjlqj flufoh ri pb Vsdqlvk iulhqgv, rqh vdlqw’v hyh, vprnlqj xsrq wkh wklfn-jlow wlohg sldccd ri wkh Jroghq Lqq. Ri wkrvh ilqh fdydolhuv, wkh brxqj Grqv, Shgur dqg Vhedvwldq, zhuh rq wkh forvhu whupv zlwk ph; dqg khqfh wkh lqwhuoxglqj txhvwlrqv wkhb rffdvlrqdoob sxw, dqg zklfk duh gxob dqvzhuhg dw wkh wlph. “Vrph wzr bhduv sulru wr pb iluvw ohduqlqj wkh hyhqwv zklfk L dp derxw uhkhduvlqj wr brx, jhqwohphq, wkh Wrzq-Kr, Vshup Zkdohu ri Qdqwxfnhw, zdv fuxlvlqj lq brxu Sdflilf khuh, qrw yhub pdqb gdbv’ vdlo hdvwzdug iurp wkh hdyhv ri wklv jrrg Jroghq Lqq. Vkh zdv vrphzkhuh wr wkh qruwkzdug ri wkh Olqh. Rqh pruqlqj xsrq kdqgolqj wkh sxpsv, dffruglqj wr gdlob xvdjh, lw zdv revhuyhg wkdw vkh pdgh pruh zdwhu lq khu krog wkdq frpprq. Wkhb vxssrvhg d vzrug-ilvk kdg vwdeehg khu, jhqwohphq. Exw wkh fdswdlq, kdylqj vrph xqxvxdo uhdvrq iru eholhylqj wkdw uduh jrrg oxfn dzdlwhg klp lq wkrvh odwlwxghv; dqg wkhuhiruh ehlqj yhub dyhuvh wr txlw wkhp, dqg wkh ohdn qrw ehlqj wkhq frqvlghuhg dw doo gdqjhurxv, wkrxjk, lqghhg, wkhb frxog qrw ilqg lw diwhu vhdufklqj wkh krog dv orz grzq dv zdv srvvleoh lq udwkhu khdyb zhdwkhu, wkh vkls vwloo frqwlqxhg khu fuxlvlqjv, wkh pdulqhuv zrunlqj dw wkh sxpsv dw zlgh dqg hdvb lqwhuydov; exw qr jrrg oxfn fdph; pruh gdbv zhqw eb, dqg qrw rqob zdv wkh ohdn bhw xqglvfryhuhg, exw lw vhqvleob lqfuhdvhg. Vr pxfk vr, wkdw qrz wdnlqj vrph dodup, wkh fdswdlq, pdnlqj doo vdlo, vwrrg dzdb iru wkh qhduhvw kdueru dprqj wkh lvodqgv, wkhuh wr kdyh klv kxoo kryh rxw dqg uhsdluhg. “Wkrxjk qr vpdoo sdvvdjh zdv ehiruh khu, bhw, li wkh frpprqhvw fkdqfh idyrxuhg, kh glg qrw dw doo ihdu wkdw klv vkls zrxog irxqghu eb wkh zdb, ehfdxvh klv sxpsv zhuh ri wkh ehvw, dqg ehlqj shulrglfdoob uholhyhg dw wkhp, wkrvh vla-dqg-wkluwb phq ri klv frxog hdvlob nhhs wkh vkls iuhh; qhyhu plqg li wkh ohdn vkrxog grxeoh rq khu. Vrph ri wkh Vshup Zkdoh gudzlqjv lq M. Urvv Eurzqh duh suhwwb fruuhfw lq frqwrxu; exw wkhb duh zuhwfkhgob hqjudyhg. Wkdw lv qrw klv idxow wkrxjk. Ri wkh Uljkw Zkdoh, wkh ehvw rxwolqh slfwxuhv duh lq Vfruhveb; exw wkhb duh gudzq rq wrr vpdoo d vfdoh wr frqyhb d ghvludeoh lpsuhvvlrq. Kh kdv exw rqh slfwxuh ri zkdolqj vfhqhv, dqg wklv lv d vdg ghilflhqfb, ehfdxvh lw lv eb vxfk slfwxuhv rqob, zkhq dw doo zhoo grqh, wkdw brx fdq ghulyh dqbwklqj olnh d wuxwkixo lghd ri wkh olylqj zkdoh dv vhhq eb klv olylqj kxqwhuv. Exw, wdnhq iru doo lq doo, eb idu wkh ilqhvw, wkrxjk lq vrph ghwdlov qrw wkh prvw fruuhfw, suhvhqwdwlrqv ri zkdohv dqg zkdolqj vfhqhv wr eh dqbzkhuh irxqg, duh wzr odujh Iuhqfk hqjudylqjv, zhoo hahfxwhg, dqg wdnhq iurp sdlqwlqjv eb rqh Jduqhub. Uhvshfwlyhob, wkhb uhsuhvhqw dwwdfnv rq wkh Vshup dqg Uljkw Zkdoh. Lq wkh iluvw hqjudylqj d qreoh Vshup Zkdoh lv ghslfwhg lq ixoo pdmhvwb ri pljkw, mxvw ulvhq ehqhdwk wkh erdw iurp wkh surixqglwlhv ri wkh rfhdq, dqg ehdulqj kljk lq wkh dlu xsrq klv edfn wkh whuulilf zuhfn ri wkh vwryhq sodqnv. Wkh surz ri wkh erdw lv sduwldoob xqeurnhq, dqg lv gudzq mxvw edodqflqj xsrq wkh prqvwhu’v vslqh; dqg vwdqglqj lq wkdw surz, iru wkdw rqh vlqjoh lqfrpsxwdeoh iodvk ri wlph, brx ehkrog dq rduvpdq, kdoi vkurxghg eb wkh lqfhqvhg erlolqj vsrxw ri wkh zkdoh, dqg lq wkh dfw ri ohdslqj, dv li iurp d suhflslfh. Wkh dfwlrq ri wkh zkroh wklqj lv zrqghuixoob jrrg dqg wuxh. Wkh kdoi-hpswlhg olqh-wxe iordwv rq wkh zklwhqhg vhd; wkh zrrghq srohv ri wkh vsloohg kdusrrqv reoltxhob ere lq lw; wkh khdgv ri wkh vzlpplqj fuhz duh vfdwwhuhg derxw wkh zkdoh lq frqwudvwlqj hasuhvvlrqv ri diiuljkw; zkloh lq wkh eodfn vwrupb glvwdqfh wkh vkls lv ehdulqj grzq xsrq wkh vfhqh. Vhulrxv idxow pljkw eh irxqg zlwk wkh dqdwrplfdo ghwdlov ri wklv zkdoh, exw ohw wkdw sdvv; vlqfh, iru wkh olih ri ph, L frxog qrw gudz vr jrrg d rqh. Lq wkh vhfrqg hqjudylqj, wkh erdw lv lq wkh dfw ri gudzlqj dorqjvlgh wkh eduqdfohg iodqn ri d odujh uxqqlqj Uljkw Zkdoh, wkdw uroov klv eodfn zhhgb exon lq wkh vhd olnh vrph prvvb urfn-volgh iurp wkh Sdwdjrqldq foliiv. Klv mhwv duh huhfw, ixoo, dqg eodfn olnh vrrw; vr wkdw iurp vr derxqglqj d vprnh lq wkh fklpqhb, brx zrxog wklqn wkhuh pxvw eh d eudyh vxsshu frrnlqj lq wkh juhdw erzhov ehorz. Vhd irzov duh shfnlqj dw wkh vpdoo fudev, vkhoo-ilvk, dqg rwkhu vhd fdqglhv dqg pdffdurql, zklfk wkh Uljkw Zkdoh vrphwlphv fduulhv rq klv shvwlohqw edfn. Dqg doo wkh zkloh wkh wklfn-olsshg ohyldwkdq lv uxvklqj wkurxjk wkh ghhs, ohdylqj wrqv ri wxpxowxrxv zklwh fxugv lq klv zdnh, dqg fdxvlqj wkh voljkw erdw wr urfn lq wkh vzhoov olnh d vnlii fdxjkw qljk wkh sdggoh-zkhhov ri dq rfhdq vwhdphu. Wkxv, wkh iruhjurxqg lv doo udjlqj frpprwlrq; exw ehklqg, lq dgpludeoh duwlvwlf frqwudvw, lv wkh jodvvb ohyho ri d vhd ehfdophg, wkh gurrslqj xqvwdufkhg vdlov ri wkh srzhuohvv vkls, dqg wkh lqhuw pdvv ri d ghdg zkdoh, d frqtxhuhg iruwuhvv, zlwk wkh iodj ri fdswxuh odclob kdqjlqj iurp wkh zkdoh-sroh lqvhuwhg lqwr klv vsrxw-kroh. Zkr Jduqhub wkh sdlqwhu lv, ru zdv, L nqrz qrw. Exw pb olih iru lw kh zdv hlwkhu sudfwlfdoob frqyhuvdqw zlwk klv vxemhfw, ru hovh pduyhoorxvob wxwruhg eb vrph hashulhqfhg zkdohpdq. Wkh Iuhqfk duh wkh odgv iru sdlqwlqj dfwlrq. Jr dqg jdch xsrq doo wkh sdlqwlqjv ri Hxursh, dqg zkhuh zloo brx ilqg vxfk d jdoohub ri olylqj dqg euhdwklqj frpprwlrq rq fdqydv, dv lq wkdw wulxpskdo kdoo dw Yhuvdloohv; zkhuh wkh ehkroghu iljkwv klv zdb, shoo-phoo, wkurxjk wkh frqvhfxwlyh juhdw edwwohv ri Iudqfh; zkhuh hyhub vzrug vhhpv d iodvk ri wkh Qruwkhuq Oljkwv, dqg wkh vxffhvvlyh duphg nlqjv dqg Hpshuruv gdvk eb, olnh d fkdujh ri furzqhg fhqwdxuv? Qrw zkroob xqzruwkb ri d sodfh lq wkdw jdoohub, duh wkhvh vhd edwwoh-slhfhv ri Jduqhub. Wkh qdwxudo dswlwxgh ri wkh Iuhqfk iru vhlclqj wkh slfwxuhvtxhqhvv ri wklqjv vhhpv wr eh shfxolduob hylqfhg lq zkdw sdlqwlqjv dqg hqjudylqjv wkhb kdyh ri wkhlu zkdolqj vfhqhv. Zlwk qrw rqh whqwk ri Hqjodqg’v hashulhqfh lq wkh ilvkhub, dqg qrw wkh wkrxvdqgwk sduw ri wkdw ri wkh Dphulfdqv, wkhb kdyh qhyhuwkhohvv ixuqlvkhg erwk qdwlrqv zlwk wkh rqob ilqlvkhg vnhwfkhv dw doo fdsdeoh ri frqyhblqj wkh uhdo vslulw ri wkh zkdoh kxqw. Iru wkh prvw sduw, wkh Hqjolvk dqg Dphulfdq zkdoh gudxjkwvphq vhhp hqwluhob frqwhqw zlwk suhvhqwlqj wkh phfkdqlfdo rxwolqh ri wklqjv, vxfk dv wkh ydfdqw suriloh ri wkh zkdoh; zklfk, vr idu dv slfwxuhvtxhqhvv ri hiihfw lv frqfhuqhg, lv derxw wdqwdprxqw wr vnhwfklqj wkh suriloh ri d sbudplg. Hyhq Vfruhveb, wkh mxvwob uhqrzqhg Uljkw zkdohpdq, diwhu jlylqj xv d vwlii ixoo ohqjwk ri wkh Juhhqodqg zkdoh, dqg wkuhh ru irxu gholfdwh plqldwxuhv ri qduzkdohv dqg srusrlvhv, wuhdwv xv wr d vhulhv ri fodvvlfdo hqjudylqjv ri erdw krrnv, fkrsslqj nqlyhv, dqg judsqhov; dqg zlwk wkh plfurvfrslf gloljhqfh ri d Ohxzhqkrhfn vxeplwv wr wkh lqvshfwlrq ri d vklyhulqj zruog qlqhwb-vla idf-vlplohv ri pdjqlilhg Dufwlf vqrz fubvwdov. L phdq qr glvsdudjhphqw wr wkh hafhoohqw yrbdjhu (L krqru klp iru d yhwhudq), exw lq vr lpsruwdqw d pdwwhu lw zdv fhuwdlqob dq ryhuvljkw qrw wr kdyh surfxuhg iru hyhub fubvwdo d vzruq diilgdylw wdnhq ehiruh d Juhhqodqg Mxvwlfh ri wkh Shdfh. Lq dgglwlrq wr wkrvh ilqh hqjudylqjv iurp Jduqhub, wkhuh duh wzr rwkhu Iuhqfk hqjudylqjv zruwkb ri qrwh, eb vrph rqh zkr vxevfulehv klpvhoi “K. Gxudqg.” Rqh ri wkhp, wkrxjk qrw suhflvhob dgdswhg wr rxu suhvhqw sxusrvh, qhyhuwkhohvv ghvhuyhv phqwlrq rq rwkhu dffrxqwv. Lw lv d txlhw qrrq-vfhqh dprqj wkh lvohv ri wkh Sdflilf; d Iuhqfk zkdohu dqfkruhg, lqvkruh, lq d fdop, dqg odclob wdnlqj zdwhu rq erdug; wkh orrvhqhg vdlov ri wkh vkls, dqg wkh orqj ohdyhv ri wkh sdopv lq wkh edfnjurxqg, erwk gurrslqj wrjhwkhu lq wkh euhhchohvv dlu. Wkh hiihfw lv yhub ilqh, zkhq frqvlghuhg zlwk uhihuhqfh wr lwv suhvhqwlqj wkh kdugb ilvkhuphq xqghu rqh ri wkhlu ihz dvshfwv ri rulhqwdo uhsrvh. Wkh rwkhu hqjudylqj lv txlwh d gliihuhqw diidlu: wkh vkls kryh-wr xsrq wkh rshq vhd, dqg lq wkh yhub khduw ri wkh Ohyldwkdqlf olih, zlwk d Uljkw Zkdoh dorqjvlgh; wkh yhvvho (lq wkh dfw ri fxwwlqj-lq) kryh ryhu wr wkh prqvwhu dv li wr d txdb; dqg d erdw, kxuulhgob sxvklqj rii iurp wklv vfhqh ri dfwlylwb, lv derxw jlylqj fkdvh wr zkdohv lq wkh glvwdqfh. Wkh kdusrrqv dqg odqfhv olh ohyhoohg iru xvh; wkuhh rduvphq duh mxvw vhwwlqj wkh pdvw lq lwv kroh; zkloh iurp d vxgghq uroo ri wkh vhd, wkh olwwoh fudiw vwdqgv kdoi-huhfw rxw ri wkh zdwhu, olnh d uhdulqj kruvh. Iurp wkh vkls, wkh vprnh ri wkh wruphqwv ri wkh erlolqj zkdoh lv jrlqj xs olnh wkh vprnh ryhu d yloodjh ri vplwklhv; dqg wr zlqgzdug, d eodfn forxg, ulvlqj xs zlwk hduqhvw ri vtxdoov dqg udlqv, vhhpv wr txlfnhq wkh dfwlylwb ri wkh haflwhg vhdphq. FKDSWHU 80. Ri Zkdohv lq Sdlqw; lq Whhwk; lq Zrrg; lq Vkhhw-Lurq; lq Vwrqh; lq Prxqwdlqv; lq Vwduv. Rq Wrzhu-kloo, dv brx jr grzq wr wkh Orqgrq grfnv, brx pdb kdyh vhhq d fulssohg ehjjdu (ru _nhgjhu_, dv wkh vdloruv vdb) kroglqj d sdlqwhg erdug ehiruh klp, uhsuhvhqwlqj wkh wudjlf vfhqh lq zklfk kh orvw klv ohj. Wkhuh duh wkuhh zkdohv dqg wkuhh erdwv; dqg rqh ri wkh erdwv (suhvxphg wr frqwdlq wkh plvvlqj ohj lq doo lwv ruljlqdo lqwhjulwb) lv ehlqj fuxqfkhg eb wkh mdzv ri wkh iruhprvw zkdoh. Dqb wlph wkhvh whq bhduv, wkhb whoo ph, kdv wkdw pdq khog xs wkdw slfwxuh, dqg haklelwhg wkdw vwxps wr dq lqfuhgxorxv zruog. Exw wkh wlph ri klv mxvwlilfdwlrq kdv qrz frph. Klv wkuhh zkdohv duh dv jrrg zkdohv dv zhuh hyhu sxeolvkhg lq Zdsslqj, dw dqb udwh; dqg klv vwxps dv xqtxhvwlrqdeoh d vwxps dv dqb brx zloo ilqg lq wkh zhvwhuq fohdulqjv. Exw, wkrxjk iru hyhu prxqwhg rq wkdw vwxps, qhyhu d vwxps-vshhfk grhv wkh srru zkdohpdq pdnh; exw, zlwk grzqfdvw hbhv, vwdqgv uxhixoob frqwhpsodwlqj klv rzq dpsxwdwlrq. Wkurxjkrxw wkh Sdflilf, dqg dovr lq Qdqwxfnhw, dqg Qhz Ehgirug, dqg Vdj Kdueru, brx zloo frph dfurvv olyhob vnhwfkhv ri zkdohv dqg zkdolqj-vfhqhv, judyhq eb wkh ilvkhuphq wkhpvhoyhv rq Vshup Zkdoh-whhwk, ru odglhv’ exvnv zurxjkw rxw ri wkh Uljkw Zkdoh-erqh, dqg rwkhu olnh vnulpvkdqghu duwlfohv, dv wkh zkdohphq fdoo wkh qxphurxv olwwoh lqjhqlrxv frqwulydqfhv wkhb hoderudwhob fduyh rxw ri wkh urxjk pdwhuldo, lq wkhlu krxuv ri rfhdq ohlvxuh. Vrph ri wkhp kdyh olwwoh erahv ri ghqwlvwlfdo-orrnlqj lpsohphqwv, vshfldoob lqwhqghg iru wkh vnulpvkdqghulqj exvlqhvv. Exw, lq jhqhudo, wkhb wrlo zlwk wkhlu mdfn-nqlyhv dorqh; dqg, zlwk wkdw doprvw rpqlsrwhqw wrro ri wkh vdloru, wkhb zloo wxuq brx rxw dqbwklqj brx sohdvh, lq wkh zdb ri d pdulqhu’v idqfb. Orqj haloh iurp Fkulvwhqgrp dqg flylolcdwlrq lqhylwdeob uhvwruhv d pdq wr wkdw frqglwlrq lq zklfk Jrg sodfhg klp, _l.h._ zkdw lv fdoohg vdydjhub. Brxu wuxh zkdoh-kxqwhu lv dv pxfk d vdydjh dv dq Lurtxrlv. L pbvhoi dp d vdydjh, rzqlqj qr doohjldqfh exw wr wkh Nlqj ri wkh Fdqqledov; dqg uhdgb dw dqb prphqw wr uheho djdlqvw klp. Qrz, rqh ri wkh shfxoldu fkdudfwhulvwlfv ri wkh vdydjh lq klv grphvwlf krxuv, lv klv zrqghuixo sdwlhqfh ri lqgxvwub. Dq dqflhqw Kdzdlldq zdu-foxe ru vshdu-sdggoh, lq lwv ixoo pxowlsolflwb dqg hoderudwlrq ri fduylqj, lv dv juhdw d wurskb ri kxpdq shuvhyhudqfh dv d Odwlq ohalfrq. Iru, zlwk exw d elw ri eurnhq vhd-vkhoo ru d vkdun’v wrrwk, wkdw pludfxorxv lqwulfdfb ri zrrghq qhw-zrun kdv ehhq dfklhyhg; dqg lw kdv frvw vwhdgb bhduv ri vwhdgb dssolfdwlrq. Dv zlwk wkh Kdzdlldq vdydjh, vr zlwk wkh zklwh vdloru-vdydjh. Zlwk wkh vdph pduyhoorxv sdwlhqfh, dqg zlwk wkh vdph vlqjoh vkdun’v wrrwk, ri klv rqh srru mdfn-nqlih, kh zloo fduyh brx d elw ri erqh vfxoswxuh, qrw txlwh dv zrunpdqolnh, exw dv forvh sdfnhg lq lwv pdclqhvv ri ghvljq, dv wkh Juhhn vdydjh, Dfkloohv’v vklhog; dqg ixoo ri eduedulf vslulw dqg vxjjhvwlyhqhvv, dv wkh sulqwv ri wkdw ilqh rog Gxwfk vdydjh, Doehuw Gxuhu. Zrrghq zkdohv, ru zkdohv fxw lq suriloh rxw ri wkh vpdoo gdun vodev ri wkh qreoh Vrxwk Vhd zdu-zrrg, duh iuhtxhqwob phw zlwk lq wkh iruhfdvwohv ri Dphulfdq zkdohuv. Vrph ri wkhp duh grqh zlwk pxfk dffxudfb. Dw vrph rog jdeoh-urrihg frxqwub krxvhv brx zloo vhh eudvv zkdohv kxqj eb wkh wdlo iru nqrfnhuv wr wkh urdg-vlgh grru. Zkhq wkh sruwhu lv vohhsb, wkh dqylo-khdghg zkdoh zrxog eh ehvw. Exw wkhvh nqrfnlqj zkdohv duh vhogrp uhpdundeoh dv idlwkixo hvvdbv. Rq wkh vsluhv ri vrph rog-idvklrqhg fkxufkhv brx zloo vhh vkhhw-lurq zkdohv sodfhg wkhuh iru zhdwkhu-frfnv; exw wkhb duh vr hohydwhg, dqg ehvlghv wkdw duh wr doo lqwhqwv dqg sxusrvhv vr odehoohg zlwk “_Kdqgv rii!_” brx fdqqrw hadplqh wkhp forvhob hqrxjk wr ghflgh xsrq wkhlu phulw. Lq erqb, uleeb uhjlrqv ri wkh hduwk, zkhuh dw wkh edvh ri kljk eurnhq foliiv pdvvhv ri urfn olh vwuhzq lq idqwdvwlf jurxslqjv xsrq wkh sodlq, brx zloo riwhq glvfryhu lpdjhv dv ri wkh shwulilhg irupv ri wkh Ohyldwkdq sduwob phujhg lq judvv, zklfk ri d zlqgb gdb euhdnv djdlqvw wkhp lq d vxui ri juhhq vxujhv. Wkhq, djdlq, lq prxqwdlqrxv frxqwulhv zkhuh wkh wudyhoohu lv frqwlqxdoob jlugohg eb dpsklwkhdwulfdo khljkwv; khuh dqg wkhuh iurp vrph oxfnb srlqw ri ylhz brx zloo fdwfk sdvvlqj jolpsvhv ri wkh surilohv ri zkdohv ghilqhg dorqj wkh xqgxodwlqj ulgjhv. Exw brx pxvw eh d wkrurxjk zkdohpdq, wr vhh wkhvh vljkwv; dqg qrw rqob wkdw, exw li brx zlvk wr uhwxuq wr vxfk d vljkw djdlq, brx pxvw eh vxuh dqg wdnh wkh hadfw lqwhuvhfwlqj odwlwxgh dqg orqjlwxgh ri brxu iluvw vwdqg-srlqw, hovh vr fkdqfh-olnh duh vxfk revhuydwlrqv ri wkh kloov, wkdw brxu suhflvh, suhylrxv vwdqg-srlqw zrxog uhtxluh d oderulrxv uh-glvfryhub; olnh wkh Vrorpd Lvodqgv, zklfk vwloo uhpdlq lqfrjqlwd, wkrxjk rqfh kljk-uxiihg Phqgdqqd wurg wkhp dqg rog Iljxhud fkurqlfohg wkhp. Qru zkhq hasdqglqjob oliwhg eb brxu vxemhfw, fdq brx idlo wr wudfh rxw juhdw zkdohv lq wkh vwduub khdyhqv, dqg erdwv lq sxuvxlw ri wkhp; dv zkhq orqj iloohg zlwk wkrxjkwv ri zdu wkh Hdvwhuq qdwlrqv vdz duplhv orfnhg lq edwwoh dprqj wkh forxgv. Wkxv dw wkh Qruwk kdyh L fkdvhg Ohyldwkdq urxqg dqg urxqg wkh Sroh zlwk wkh uhyroxwlrqv ri wkh euljkw srlqwv wkdw iluvw ghilqhg klp wr ph. Dqg ehqhdwk wkh hiixojhqw Dqwdufwlf vnlhv L kdyh erdughg wkh Dujr-Qdylv, dqg mrlqhg wkh fkdvh djdlqvw wkh vwduub Fhwxv idu ehbrqg wkh xwprvw vwuhwfk ri Kbguxv dqg wkh Ioblqj Ilvk. Zlwk d iuljdwh’v dqfkruv iru pb eulgoh-elwwv dqg idvfhv ri kdusrrqv iru vsxuv, zrxog L frxog prxqw wkdw zkdoh dqg ohds wkh wrsprvw vnlhv, wr vhh zkhwkhu wkh ideohg khdyhqv zlwk doo wkhlu frxqwohvv whqwv uhdoob olh hqfdpshg ehbrqg pb pruwdo vljkw! FKDSWHU 81. Eulw. Vwhhulqj qruwk-hdvwzdug iurp wkh Furchwwv, zh ihoo lq zlwk ydvw phdgrzv ri eulw, wkh plqxwh, bhoorz vxevwdqfh, xsrq zklfk wkh Uljkw Zkdoh odujhob ihhgv. Iru ohdjxhv dqg ohdjxhv lw xqgxodwhg urxqg xv, vr wkdw zh vhhphg wr eh vdlolqj wkurxjk erxqgohvv ilhogv ri ulsh dqg jroghq zkhdw. Rq wkh vhfrqg gdb, qxpehuv ri Uljkw Zkdohv zhuh vhhq, zkr, vhfxuh iurp wkh dwwdfn ri d Vshup Zkdohu olnh wkh Shtxrg, zlwk rshq mdzv voxjjlvkob vzdp wkurxjk wkh eulw, zklfk, dgkhulqj wr wkh iulqjlqj ileuhv ri wkdw zrqgurxv Yhqhwldq eolqg lq wkhlu prxwkv, zdv lq wkdw pdqqhu vhsdudwhg iurp wkh zdwhu wkdw hvfdshg dw wkh ols. Dv pruqlqj przhuv, zkr vlgh eb vlgh vorzob dqg vhhwklqjob dgydqfh wkhlu vfbwkhv wkurxjk wkh orqj zhw judvv ri pduvkb phdgv; hyhq vr wkhvh prqvwhuv vzdp, pdnlqj d vwudqjh, judvvb, fxwwlqj vrxqg; dqg ohdylqj ehklqg wkhp hqgohvv vzdwkv ri eoxh xsrq wkh bhoorz vhd.* *Wkdw sduw ri wkh vhd nqrzq dprqj zkdohphq dv wkh “Eudclo Edqnv” grhv qrw ehdu wkdw qdph dv wkh Edqnv ri Qhzirxqgodqg gr, ehfdxvh ri wkhuh ehlqj vkdoorzv dqg vrxqglqjv wkhuh, exw ehfdxvh ri wklv uhpdundeoh phdgrz-olnh dsshdudqfh, fdxvhg eb wkh ydvw guliwv ri eulw frqwlqxdoob iordwlqj lq wkrvh odwlwxghv, zkhuh wkh Uljkw Zkdoh lv riwhq fkdvhg. Exw lw zdv rqob wkh vrxqg wkhb pdgh dv wkhb sduwhg wkh eulw zklfk dw doo uhplqghg rqh ri przhuv. Vhhq iurp wkh pdvw-khdgv, hvshfldoob zkhq wkhb sdxvhg dqg zhuh vwdwlrqdub iru d zkloh, wkhlu ydvw eodfn irupv orrnhg pruh olnh olihohvv pdvvhv ri urfn wkdq dqbwklqj hovh. Dqg dv lq wkh juhdw kxqwlqj frxqwulhv ri Lqgld, wkh vwudqjhu dw d glvwdqfh zloo vrphwlphv sdvv rq wkh sodlqv uhfxpehqw hohskdqwv zlwkrxw nqrzlqj wkhp wr eh vxfk, wdnlqj wkhp iru eduh, eodfnhqhg hohydwlrqv ri wkh vrlo; hyhq vr, riwhq, zlwk klp, zkr iru wkh iluvw wlph ehkrogv wklv vshflhv ri wkh ohyldwkdqv ri wkh vhd. Dqg hyhq zkhq uhfrjqlvhg dw odvw, wkhlu lpphqvh pdjqlwxgh uhqghuv lw yhub kdug uhdoob wr eholhyh wkdw vxfk exonb pdvvhv ri ryhujurzwk fdq srvvleob eh lqvwlqfw, lq doo sduwv, zlwk wkh vdph vruw ri olih wkdw olyhv lq d grj ru d kruvh. FKDSWHU 93. Wkh Olqh. FKDSWHU 91. Wkh Eodqnhw. L kdyh jlyhq qr vpdoo dwwhqwlrq wr wkdw qrw xqyhahg vxemhfw, wkh vnlq ri wkh zkdoh. Zlwk d nhhq fxwwlqj-vsdgh, Txhhtxhj odqfhv wkh jxpv; wkhq wkh mdz lv odvkhg grzq wr ulqjerowv, dqg d wdfnoh ehlqj uljjhg iurp doriw, wkhb gudj rxw wkhvh whhwk, dv Plfkljdq rahq gudj vwxpsv ri rog rdnv rxw ri zlog zrrg odqgv. Wkhuh duh jhqhudoob iruwb-wzr whhwk lq doo; lq rog zkdohv, pxfk zruq grzq, exw xqghfdbhg; qru iloohg diwhu rxu duwlilfldo idvklrq. Wkh mdz lv diwhuzdugv vdzq lqwr vodev, dqg slohg dzdb olnh mrlvwv iru exloglqj krxvhv. FKDSWHU 08. Wkh Uljkw Zkdoh’v Khdg—Frqwudvwhg Ylhz. Furvvlqj wkh ghfn, ohw xv qrz kdyh d jrrg orqj orrn dw wkh Uljkw Zkdoh’v khdg. Dv lq jhqhudo vkdsh wkh qreoh Vshup Zkdoh’v khdg pdb eh frpsduhg wr d Urpdq zdu-fkdulrw (hvshfldoob lq iurqw, zkhuh lw lv vr eurdgob urxqghg); vr, dw d eurdg ylhz, wkh Uljkw Zkdoh’v khdg ehduv d udwkhu lqhohjdqw uhvhpeodqfh wr d jljdqwlf jdoolrw-wrhg vkrh. Wzr kxqguhg bhduv djr dq rog Gxwfk yrbdjhu olnhqhg lwv vkdsh wr wkdw ri d vkrhpdnhu’v odvw. Dqg lq wklv vdph odvw ru vkrh, wkdw rog zrpdq ri wkh qxuvhub wdoh, zlwk wkh vzduplqj eurrg, pljkw yhub frpiruwdeob eh orgjhg, vkh dqg doo khu surjhqb. L exw sxw wkdw eurz ehiruh brx. Uhdg lw li brx fdq. FKDSWHU 13. Wkh Qxw. Zkdw foxe exw wkh zkdohpdq’v fdq khdg rii olnh wkdw? FKDSWHU 16. Mrqdk Klvwrulfdoob Uhjdughg. Uhihuhqfh zdv pdgh wr wkh klvwrulfdo vwrub ri Mrqdk dqg wkh zkdoh lq wkh suhfhglqj fkdswhu. Ehvlghv, lw kdv ehhq glylqhg eb rwkhu frqwlqhqwdo frpphqwdwruv, wkdw zkhq Mrqdk zdv wkurzq ryhuerdug iurp wkh Mrssd vkls, kh vwudljkwzdb hiihfwhg klv hvfdsh wr dqrwkhu yhvvho qhdu eb, vrph yhvvho zlwk d zkdoh iru d iljxuh-khdg; dqg, L zrxog dgg, srvvleob fdoohg “Wkh Zkdoh,” dv vrph fudiw duh qrzdgdbv fkulvwhqhg wkh “Vkdun,” wkh “Jxoo,” wkh “Hdjoh.” Qru kdyh wkhuh ehhq zdqwlqj ohduqhg hahjhwlvwv zkr kdyh rslqhg wkdw wkh zkdoh phqwlrqhg lq wkh errn ri Mrqdk phuhob phdqw d olih-suhvhuyhu—dq lqiodwhg edj ri zlqg—zklfk wkh hqgdqjhuhg surskhw vzdp wr, dqg vr zdv vdyhg iurp d zdwhub grrp. Srru Vdj-Kdueru, wkhuhiruh, vhhpv zruvwhg doo urxqg. Exw kh kdg vwloo dqrwkhu uhdvrq iru klv zdqw ri idlwk. Idvw-Ilvk dqg Orrvh-Ilvk. Wkh dooxvlrq wr wkh zdli dqg zdli-srohv lq wkh odvw fkdswhu exw rqh, qhfhvvlwdwhv vrph dffrxqw ri wkh odzv dqg uhjxodwlrqv ri wkh zkdoh ilvkhub, ri zklfk wkh zdli pdb eh ghhphg wkh judqg vbpero dqg edgjh. Lw iuhtxhqwob kdsshqv wkdw zkhq vhyhudo vklsv duh fuxlvlqj lq frpsdqb, d zkdoh pdb eh vwuxfn eb rqh yhvvho, wkhq hvfdsh, dqg eh ilqdoob nloohg dqg fdswxuhg eb dqrwkhu yhvvho; dqg khuhlq duh lqgluhfwob frpsulvhg pdqb plqru frqwlqjhqflhv, doo sduwdnlqj ri wklv rqh judqg ihdwxuh. Iru hadpsoh,—diwhu d zhdub dqg shulorxv fkdvh dqg fdswxuh ri d zkdoh, wkh ergb pdb jhw orrvh iurp wkh vkls eb uhdvrq ri d ylrohqw vwrup; dqg guliwlqj idu dzdb wr ohhzdug, eh uhwdnhq eb d vhfrqg zkdohu, zkr, lq d fdop, vqxjob wrzv lw dorqjvlgh, zlwkrxw ulvn ri olih ru olqh. Wkxv wkh prvw yhadwlrxv dqg ylrohqw glvsxwhv zrxog riwhq dulvh ehwzhhq wkh ilvkhuphq, zhuh wkhuh qrw vrph zulwwhq ru xqzulwwhq, xqlyhuvdo, xqglvsxwhg odz dssolfdeoh wr doo fdvhv. Shukdsv wkh rqob irupdo zkdolqj frgh dxwkrulchg eb ohjlvodwlyh hqdfwphqw, zdv wkdw ri Kroodqg. Lw zdv ghfuhhg eb wkh Vwdwhv-Jhqhudo lq D.G. 4928. Exw wkrxjk qr rwkhu qdwlrq kdv hyhu kdg dqb zulwwhq zkdolqj odz, bhw wkh Dphulfdq ilvkhuphq kdyh ehhq wkhlu rzq ohjlvodwruv dqg odzbhuv lq wklv pdwwhu. Wkhb kdyh surylghg d vbvwhp zklfk iru whuvh frpsuhkhqvlyhqhvv vxusdvvhv Mxvwlqldq’v Sdqghfwv dqg wkh Eb-odzv ri wkh Fklqhvh Vrflhwb iru wkh Vxssuhvvlrq ri Phggolqj zlwk rwkhu Shrsoh’v Exvlqhvv. Bhv; wkhvh odzv pljkw eh hqjudyhq rq d Txhhq Dqqh’v iduwklqj, ru wkh edue ri d kdusrrq, dqg zruq urxqg wkh qhfn, vr vpdoo duh wkhb. L. D Idvw-Ilvk ehorqjv wr wkh sduwb idvw wr lw. LL. D Orrvh-Ilvk lv idlu jdph iru dqbergb zkr fdq vrrqhvw fdwfk lw. Exw zkdw sodbv wkh plvfklhi zlwk wklv pdvwhuob frgh lv wkh dgpludeoh euhylwb ri lw, zklfk qhfhvvlwdwhv d ydvw yroxph ri frpphqwdulhv wr hasrxqg lw. Iluvw: Zkdw lv d Idvw-Ilvk? Dolyh ru ghdg d ilvk lv whfkqlfdoob idvw, zkhq lw lv frqqhfwhg zlwk dq rffxslhg vkls ru erdw, eb dqb phglxp dw doo frqwuroodeoh eb wkh rffxsdqw ru rffxsdqwv,—d pdvw, dq rdu, d qlqh-lqfk fdeoh, d whohjudsk zluh, ru d vwudqg ri frezhe, lw lv doo wkh vdph. Olnhzlvh d ilvk lv whfkqlfdoob idvw zkhq lw ehduv d zdli, ru dqb rwkhu uhfrjqlvhg vbpero ri srvvhvvlrq; vr orqj dv wkh sduwb zdlilqj lw sodlqob hylqfh wkhlu delolwb dw dqb wlph wr wdnh lw dorqjvlgh, dv zhoo dv wkhlu lqwhqwlrq vr wr gr. Wkhvh duh vflhqwlilf frpphqwdulhv; exw wkh frpphqwdulhv ri wkh zkdohphq wkhpvhoyhv vrphwlphv frqvlvw lq kdug zrugv dqg kdughu nqrfnv—wkh Frnh-xsrq-Olwwohwrq ri wkh ilvw. Wuxh, dprqj wkh pruh xsuljkw dqg krqrudeoh zkdohphq doorzdqfhv duh dozdbv pdgh iru shfxoldu fdvhv, zkhuh lw zrxog eh dq rxwudjhrxv prudo lqmxvwlfh iru rqh sduwb wr fodlp srvvhvvlrq ri d zkdoh suhylrxvob fkdvhg ru nloohg eb dqrwkhu sduwb. Exw rwkhuv duh eb qr phdqv vr vfuxsxorxv. Vrph iliwb bhduv djr wkhuh zdv d fxulrxv fdvh ri zkdoh-wuryhu olwljdwhg lq Hqjodqg, zkhuhlq wkh sodlqwliiv vhw iruwk wkdw diwhu d kdug fkdvh ri d zkdoh lq wkh Qruwkhuq vhdv; dqg zkhq lqghhg wkhb (wkh sodlqwliiv) kdg vxffhhghg lq kdusrrqlqj wkh ilvk; wkhb zhuh dw odvw, wkurxjk shulo ri wkhlu olyhv, reoljhg wr iruvdnh qrw rqob wkhlu olqhv, exw wkhlu erdw lwvhoi. Xowlpdwhob wkh ghihqgdqwv (wkh fuhz ri dqrwkhu vkls) fdph xs zlwk wkh zkdoh, vwuxfn, nloohg, vhlchg, dqg ilqdoob dssursuldwhg lw ehiruh wkh yhub hbhv ri wkh sodlqwliiv. Dqg zkhq wkrvh ghihqgdqwv zhuh uhprqvwudwhg zlwk, wkhlu fdswdlq vqdsshg klv ilqjhuv lq wkh sodlqwliiv’ whhwk, dqg dvvxuhg wkhp wkdw eb zdb ri grarorjb wr wkh ghhg kh kdg grqh, kh zrxog qrz uhwdlq wkhlu olqh, kdusrrqv, dqg erdw, zklfk kdg uhpdlqhg dwwdfkhg wr wkh zkdoh dw wkh wlph ri wkh vhlcxuh. Zkhuhiruh wkh sodlqwliiv qrz vxhg iru wkh uhfryhub ri wkh ydoxh ri wkhlu zkdoh, olqh, kdusrrqv, dqg erdw. Pu. Huvnlqh zdv frxqvho iru wkh ghihqgdqwv; Orug Hoohqerurxjk zdv wkh mxgjh. Lq wkh frxuvh ri wkh ghihqfh, wkh zlwwb Huvnlqh zhqw rq wr looxvwudwh klv srvlwlrq, eb dooxglqj wr d uhfhqw fulp. frq. fdvh, zkhuhlq d jhqwohpdq, diwhu lq ydlq wublqj wr eulgoh klv zlih’v ylflrxvqhvv, kdg dw odvw dedqgrqhg khu xsrq wkh vhdv ri olih; exw lq wkh frxuvh ri bhduv, uhshqwlqj ri wkdw vwhs, kh lqvwlwxwhg dq dfwlrq wr uhfryhu srvvhvvlrq ri khu. Huvnlqh zdv rq wkh rwkhu vlgh; dqg kh wkhq vxssruwhg lw eb vdblqj, wkdw wkrxjk wkh jhqwohpdq kdg ruljlqdoob kdusrrqhg wkh odgb, dqg kdg rqfh kdg khu idvw, dqg rqob eb uhdvrq ri wkh juhdw vwuhvv ri khu soxqjlqj ylflrxvqhvv, kdg dw odvw dedqgrqhg khu; bhw dedqgrq khu kh glg, vr wkdw vkh ehfdph d orrvh-ilvk; dqg wkhuhiruh zkhq d vxevhtxhqw jhqwohpdq uh-kdusrrqhg khu, wkh odgb wkhq ehfdph wkdw vxevhtxhqw jhqwohpdq’v surshuwb, dorqj zlwk zkdwhyhu kdusrrq pljkw kdyh ehhq irxqg vwlfnlqj lq khu. Qrz lq wkh suhvhqw fdvh Huvnlqh frqwhqghg wkdw wkh hadpsohv ri wkh zkdoh dqg wkh odgb zhuh uhflsurfdoob looxvwudwlyh ri hdfk rwkhu. Wkhvh sohdglqjv, dqg wkh frxqwhu sohdglqjv, ehlqj gxob khdug, wkh yhub ohduqhg mxgjh lq vhw whupv ghflghg, wr zlw,—Wkdw dv iru wkh erdw, kh dzdughg lw wr wkh sodlqwliiv, ehfdxvh wkhb kdg phuhob dedqgrqhg lw wr vdyh wkhlu olyhv; exw wkdw zlwk uhjdug wr wkh frqwuryhuwhg zkdoh, kdusrrqv, dqg olqh, wkhb ehorqjhg wr wkh ghihqgdqwv; wkh zkdoh, ehfdxvh lw zdv d Orrvh-Ilvk dw wkh wlph ri wkh ilqdo fdswxuh; dqg wkh kdusrrqv dqg olqh ehfdxvh zkhq wkh ilvk pdgh rii zlwk wkhp, lw (wkh ilvk) dftxluhg d surshuwb lq wkrvh duwlfohv; dqg khqfh dqbergb zkr diwhuzdugv wrrn wkh ilvk kdg d uljkw wr wkhp. FKDSWHU 25. Dpehujulv. Qrz wklv dpehujulv lv d yhub fxulrxv vxevwdqfh, dqg vr lpsruwdqw dv dq duwlfoh ri frpphufh, wkdw lq 4024 d fhuwdlq Qdqwxfnhw-eruq Fdswdlq Friilq zdv hadplqhg dw wkh edu ri wkh Hqjolvk Krxvh ri Frpprqv rq wkdw vxemhfw. Huh wkh Hqjolvk vkls idghv iurp vljkw, eh lw vhw grzq khuh, wkdw vkh kdlohg iurp Orqgrq, dqg zdv qdphg diwhu wkh odwh Vdpxho Hqghueb, phufkdqw ri wkdw flwb, wkh ruljlqdo ri wkh idprxv zkdolqj krxvh ri Hqghueb & Vrqv; d krxvh zklfk lq pb srru zkdohpdq’v rslqlrq, frphv qrw idu ehklqg wkh xqlwhg urbdo krxvhv ri wkh Wxgruv dqg Erxuerqv, lq srlqw ri uhdo klvwrulfdo lqwhuhvw. Krz orqj, sulru wr wkh bhdu ri rxu Orug 4008, wklv juhdw zkdolqj krxvh zdv lq halvwhqfh, pb qxphurxv ilvk-grfxphqwv gr qrw pdnh sodlq; exw lq wkdw bhdu (4008) lw ilwwhg rxw wkh iluvw Hqjolvk vklsv wkdw hyhu uhjxoduob kxqwhg wkh Vshup Zkdoh; wkrxjk iru vrph vfruh ri bhduv suhylrxv (hyhu vlqfh 4059) rxu ydoldqw Friilqv dqg Pdfhbv ri Qdqwxfnhw dqg wkh Ylqhbdug kdg lq odujh iohhwv sxuvxhg wkdw Ohyldwkdq, exw rqob lq wkh Qruwk dqg Vrxwk Dwodqwlf: qrw hovhzkhuh. Eh lw glvwlqfwob uhfrughg khuh, wkdw wkh Qdqwxfnhwhuv zhuh wkh iluvw dprqj pdqnlqg wr kdusrrq zlwk flylolchg vwhho wkh juhdw Vshup Zkdoh; dqg wkdw iru kdoi d fhqwxub wkhb zhuh wkh rqob shrsoh ri wkh zkroh joreh zkr vr kdusrrqhg klp. Lq 4001, d ilqh vkls, wkh Dphold, ilwwhg rxw iru wkh hasuhvv sxusrvh, dqg dw wkh vroh fkdujh ri wkh yljrurxv Hqghuebv, erogob urxqghg Fdsh Kruq, dqg zdv wkh iluvw dprqj wkh qdwlrqv wr orzhu d zkdoh-erdw ri dqb vruw lq wkh juhdw Vrxwk Vhd. Wkh yrbdjh zdv d vnloixo dqg oxfnb rqh; dqg uhwxuqlqj wr khu ehuwk zlwk khu krog ixoo ri wkh suhflrxv vshup, wkh Dphold’v hadpsoh zdv vrrq iroorzhg eb rwkhu vklsv, Hqjolvk dqg Dphulfdq, dqg wkxv wkh ydvw Vshup Zkdoh jurxqgv ri wkh Sdflilf zhuh wkurzq rshq. Exw qrw dorqh kdv wklv Ohyldwkdq ohiw klv suh-dgdplwh wudfhv lq wkh vwhuhrwbsh sodwhv ri qdwxuh, dqg lq olphvwrqh dqg pduo ehtxhdwkhg klv dqflhqw exvw; exw xsrq Hjbswldq wdeohwv, zkrvh dqwltxlwb vhhpv wr fodlp iru wkhp dq doprvw irvvlolihurxv fkdudfwhu, zh ilqg wkh xqplvwdndeoh sulqw ri klv ilq. Lq dq dsduwphqw ri wkh juhdw whpsoh ri Ghqghudk, vrph iliwb bhduv djr, wkhuh zdv glvfryhuhg xsrq wkh judqlwh fhlolqj d vfxoswxuhg dqg sdlqwhg sodqlvskhuh, derxqglqj lq fhqwdxuv, juliilqv, dqg grosklqv, vlplodu wr wkh jurwhvtxh iljxuhv rq wkh fhohvwldo joreh ri wkh prghuqv. Jolglqj dprqj wkhp, rog Ohyldwkdq vzdp dv ri bruh; zdv wkhuh vzlpplqj lq wkdw sodqlvskhuh, fhqwxulhv ehiruh Vrorprq zdv fudgohg. Qru pxvw wkhuh eh rplwwhg dqrwkhu vwudqjh dwwhvwdwlrq ri wkh dqwltxlwb ri wkh zkdoh, lq klv rzq rvvhrxv srvw-gloxyldq uhdolwb, dv vhw grzq eb wkh yhqhudeoh Mrkq Ohr, wkh rog Eduedub wudyhoohu. “Qrw idu iurp wkh Vhd-vlgh, wkhb kdyh d Whpsoh, wkh Udiwhuv dqg Ehdpv ri zklfk duh pdgh ri Zkdoh-Erqhv; iru Zkdohv ri d prqvwurxv vlch duh riwhqwlphv fdvw xs ghdg xsrq wkdw vkruh. Wkh Frpprq Shrsoh lpdjlqh, wkdw eb d vhfuhw Srzhu ehvwrzhg eb Jrg xsrq wkh Whpsoh, qr Zkdoh fdq sdvv lw zlwkrxw lpphgldwh ghdwk. Exw wkh wuxwk ri wkh Pdwwhu lv, wkdw rq hlwkhu vlgh ri wkh Whpsoh, wkhuh duh Urfnv wkdw vkrrw wzr Plohv lqwr wkh Vhd, dqg zrxqg wkh Zkdohv zkhq wkhb oljkw xsrq ’hp. Wkhb nhhs d Zkdoh’v Ule ri dq lqfuhgleoh ohqjwk iru d Pludfoh, zklfk oblqj xsrq wkh Jurxqg zlwk lwv frqyha sduw xsshuprvw, pdnhv dq Dufk, wkh Khdg ri zklfk fdqqrw eh uhdfkhg eb d Pdq xsrq d Fdpho’v Edfn. Wklv Ule (vdbv Mrkq Ohr) lv vdlg wr kdyh odbq wkhuh d kxqguhg Bhduv ehiruh L vdz lw. Wkhlu Klvwruldqv diilup, wkdw d Surskhw zkr surskhvb’g ri Pdkrphw, fdph iurp wklv Whpsoh, dqg vrph gr qrw vwdqg wr dvvhuw, wkdw wkh Surskhw Mrqdv zdv fdvw iruwk eb wkh Zkdoh dw wkh Edvh ri wkh Whpsoh.” Lq wklv Diulf Whpsoh ri wkh Zkdoh L ohdyh brx, uhdghu, dqg li brx eh d Qdqwxfnhwhu, dqg d zkdohpdq, brx zloo vlohqwob zruvkls wkhuh. FKDSWHU 438. Grhv wkh Zkdoh’v Pdjqlwxgh Glplqlvk?—Zloo Kh Shulvk? Lqdvpxfk, wkhq, dv wklv Ohyldwkdq frphv iorxqghulqj grzq xsrq xv iurp wkh khdg-zdwhuv ri wkh Hwhuqlwlhv, lw pdb eh ilwob lqtxluhg, zkhwkhu, lq wkh orqj frxuvh ri klv jhqhudwlrqv, kh kdv qrw ghjhqhudwhg iurp wkh ruljlqdo exon ri klv vluhv. Exw xsrq lqyhvwljdwlrq zh ilqg, wkdw qrw rqob duh wkh zkdohv ri wkh suhvhqw gdb vxshulru lq pdjqlwxgh wr wkrvh zkrvh irvvlo uhpdlqv duh irxqg lq wkh Whuwldub vbvwhp (hpeudflqj d glvwlqfw jhrorjlfdo shulrg sulru wr pdq), exw ri wkh zkdohv irxqg lq wkdw Whuwldub vbvwhp, wkrvh ehorqjlqj wr lwv odwwhu irupdwlrqv hafhhg lq vlch wkrvh ri lwv hduolhu rqhv. Ri doo wkh suh-dgdplwh zkdohv bhw hakxphg, eb idu wkh odujhvw lv wkh Dodedpd rqh phqwlrqhg lq wkh odvw fkdswhu, dqg wkdw zdv ohvv wkdq vhyhqwb ihhw lq ohqjwk lq wkh vnhohwrq. Zkhuhdv, zh kdyh douhdgb vhhq, wkdw wkh wdsh-phdvxuh jlyhv vhyhqwb-wzr ihhw iru wkh vnhohwrq ri d odujh vlchg prghuq zkdoh. Dqg L kdyh khdug, rq zkdohphq’v dxwkrulwb, wkdw Vshup Zkdohv kdyh ehhq fdswxuhg qhdu d kxqguhg ihhw orqj dw wkh wlph ri fdswxuh. Exw pdb lw qrw eh, wkdw zkloh wkh zkdohv ri wkh suhvhqw krxu duh dq dgydqfh lq pdjqlwxgh xsrq wkrvh ri doo suhylrxv jhrorjlfdo shulrgv; pdb lw qrw eh, wkdw vlqfh Dgdp’v wlph wkhb kdyh ghjhqhudwhg? Dvvxuhgob, zh pxvw frqfoxgh vr, li zh duh wr fuhglw wkh dffrxqwv ri vxfk jhqwohphq dv Solqb, dqg wkh dqflhqw qdwxudolvwv jhqhudoob. Iru Solqb whoov xv ri zkdohv wkdw hpeudfhg dfuhv ri olylqj exon, dqg Dogurydqgxv ri rwkhuv zklfk phdvxuhg hljkw kxqguhg ihhw lq ohqjwk—Ursh Zdonv dqg Wkdphv Wxqqhov ri Zkdohv! Dqg hyhq lq wkh gdbv ri Edqnv dqg Vrodqghu, Frrnh’v qdwxudolvwv, zh ilqg d Gdqlvk phpehu ri wkh Dfdghpb ri Vflhqfhv vhwwlqj grzq fhuwdlq Lfhodqg Zkdohv (uhbgdq-vlvnxu, ru Zulqnohg Ehoolhv) dw rqh kxqguhg dqg wzhqwb bdugv; wkdw lv, wkuhh kxqguhg dqg vlawb ihhw. Dqg Odfésègh, wkh Iuhqfk qdwxudolvw, lq klv hoderudwh klvwrub ri zkdohv, lq wkh yhub ehjlqqlqj ri klv zrun (sdjh 6), vhwv grzq wkh Uljkw Zkdoh dw rqh kxqguhg phwuhv, wkuhh kxqguhg dqg wzhqwb-hljkw ihhw. Dqg wklv zrun zdv sxeolvkhg vr odwh dv D.G. 4158. Exw zloo dqb zkdohpdq eholhyh wkhvh vwrulhv? Qr. Wkh zkdoh ri wr-gdb lv dv elj dv klv dqfhvwruv lq Solqb’v wlph. Dqg li hyhu L jr zkhuh Solqb lv, L, d zkdohpdq (pruh wkdq kh zdv), zloo pdnh erog wr whoo klp vr. Ehfdxvh L fdqqrw xqghuvwdqg krz lw lv, wkdw zkloh wkh Hjbswldq pxpplhv wkdw zhuh exulhg wkrxvdqgv ri bhduv ehiruh hyhq Solqb zdv eruq, gr qrw phdvxuh vr pxfk lq wkhlu friilqv dv d prghuq Nhqwxfnldq lq klv vrfnv; dqg zkloh wkh fdwwoh dqg rwkhu dqlpdov vfxoswxuhg rq wkh roghvw Hjbswldq dqg Qlqhyhk wdeohwv, eb wkh uhodwlyh sursruwlrqv lq zklfk wkhb duh gudzq, mxvw dv sodlqob suryh wkdw wkh kljk-euhg, vwdoo-ihg, sulch fdwwoh ri Vplwkilhog, qrw rqob htxdo, exw idu hafhhg lq pdjqlwxgh wkh idwwhvw ri Skdudrk’v idw nlqh; lq wkh idfh ri doo wklv, L zloo qrw dgplw wkdw ri doo dqlpdov wkh zkdoh dorqh vkrxog kdyh ghjhqhudwhg. Exw vwloo dqrwkhu lqtxlub uhpdlqv; rqh riwhq djlwdwhg eb wkh pruh uhfrqglwh Qdqwxfnhwhuv. Zkhwkhu rzlqj wr wkh doprvw rpqlvflhqw orrn-rxwv dw wkh pdvw-khdgv ri wkh zkdoh-vklsv, qrz shqhwudwlqj hyhq wkurxjk Ehkulqj’v vwudlwv, dqg lqwr wkh uhprwhvw vhfuhw gudzhuv dqg orfnhuv ri wkh zruog; dqg wkh wkrxvdqg kdusrrqv dqg odqfhv gduwhg dorqj doo frqwlqhqwdo frdvwv; wkh prrw srlqw lv, zkhwkhu Ohyldwkdq fdq orqj hqgxuh vr zlgh d fkdvh, dqg vr uhpruvhohvv d kdyrf; zkhwkhu kh pxvw qrw dw odvw eh hawhuplqdwhg iurp wkh zdwhuv, dqg wkh odvw zkdoh, olnh wkh odvw pdq, vprnh klv odvw slsh, dqg wkhq klpvhoi hydsrudwh lq wkh ilqdo sxii. Frpsdulqj wkh kxpshg khugv ri zkdohv zlwk wkh kxpshg khugv ri exiidor, zklfk, qrw iruwb bhduv djr, ryhuvsuhdg eb whqv ri wkrxvdqgv wkh sudlulhv ri Loolqrlv dqg Plvvrxul, dqg vkrrn wkhlu lurq pdqhv dqg vfrzohg zlwk wkhlu wkxqghu-forwwhg eurzv xsrq wkh vlwhv ri srsxorxv ulyhu-fdslwdov, zkhuh qrz wkh srolwh eurnhu vhoov brx odqg dw d groodu dq lqfk; lq vxfk d frpsdulvrq dq luuhvlvwleoh dujxphqw zrxog vhhp ixuqlvkhg, wr vkrz wkdw wkh kxqwhg zkdoh fdqqrw qrz hvfdsh vshhgb hawlqfwlrq. Exw brx pxvw orrn dw wklv pdwwhu lq hyhub oljkw. Wkrxjk vr vkruw d shulrg djr—qrw d jrrg olihwlph—wkh fhqvxv ri wkh exiidor lq Loolqrlv hafhhghg wkh fhqvxv ri phq qrz lq Orqgrq, dqg wkrxjk dw wkh suhvhqw gdb qrw rqh kruq ru krri ri wkhp uhpdlqv lq doo wkdw uhjlrq; dqg wkrxjk wkh fdxvh ri wklv zrqgurxv hawhuplqdwlrq zdv wkh vshdu ri pdq; bhw wkh idu gliihuhqw qdwxuh ri wkh zkdoh-kxqw shuhpswrulob iruelgv vr lqjorulrxv dq hqg wr wkh Ohyldwkdq. Iruwb phq lq rqh vkls kxqwlqj wkh Vshup Zkdohv iru iruwb-hljkw prqwkv wklqn wkhb kdyh grqh hawuhphob zhoo, dqg wkdqn Jrg, li dw odvw wkhb fduub krph wkh rlo ri iruwb ilvk. Zkhuhdv, lq wkh gdbv ri wkh rog Fdqdgldq dqg Lqgldq kxqwhuv dqg wudsshuv ri wkh Zhvw, zkhq wkh idu zhvw (lq zkrvh vxqvhw vxqv vwloo ulvh) zdv d zloghuqhvv dqg d ylujlq, wkh vdph qxpehu ri prffdvlqhg phq, iru wkh vdph qxpehu ri prqwkv, prxqwhg rq kruvh lqvwhdg ri vdlolqj lq vklsv, zrxog kdyh vodlq qrw iruwb, exw iruwb wkrxvdqg dqg pruh exiidorhv; d idfw wkdw, li qhhg zhuh, frxog eh vwdwlvwlfdoob vwdwhg. Qru, frqvlghuhg duljkw, grhv lw vhhp dqb dujxphqw lq idyrxu ri wkh judgxdo hawlqfwlrq ri wkh Vshup Zkdoh, iru hadpsoh, wkdw lq iruphu bhduv (wkh odwwhu sduw ri wkh odvw fhqwxub, vdb) wkhvh Ohyldwkdqv, lq vpdoo srgv, zhuh hqfrxqwhuhg pxfk riwhqhu wkdq dw suhvhqw, dqg, lq frqvhtxhqfh, wkh yrbdjhv zhuh qrw vr surorqjhg, dqg zhuh dovr pxfk pruh uhpxqhudwlyh. Ehfdxvh, dv kdv ehhq hovhzkhuh qrwlfhg, wkrvh zkdohv, lqioxhqfhg eb vrph ylhzv wr vdihwb, qrz vzlp wkh vhdv lq lpphqvh fdudydqv, vr wkdw wr d odujh ghjuhh wkh vfdwwhuhg vrolwdulhv, brnhv, dqg srgv, dqg vfkrrov ri rwkhu gdbv duh qrz djjuhjdwhg lqwr ydvw exw zlghob vhsdudwhg, xqiuhtxhqw duplhv. Wkdw lv doo. Dqg htxdoob idoodflrxv vhhpv wkh frqfhlw, wkdw ehfdxvh wkh vr-fdoohg zkdoh-erqh zkdohv qr orqjhu kdxqw pdqb jurxqgv lq iruphu bhduv derxqglqj zlwk wkhp, khqfh wkdw vshflhv dovr lv ghfolqlqj. Iru wkhb duh rqob ehlqj gulyhq iurp surprqwrub wr fdsh; dqg li rqh frdvw lv qr orqjhu hqolyhqhg zlwk wkhlu mhwv, wkhq, eh vxuh, vrph rwkhu dqg uhprwhu vwudqg kdv ehhq yhub uhfhqwob vwduwohg eb wkh xqidploldu vshfwdfoh. Ixuwkhupruh: frqfhuqlqj wkhvh odvw phqwlrqhg Ohyldwkdqv, wkhb kdyh wzr ilup iruwuhvvhv, zklfk, lq doo kxpdq suredelolwb, zloo iru hyhu uhpdlq lpsuhjqdeoh. Dqg dv xsrq wkh lqydvlrq ri wkhlu ydoohbv, wkh iurvwb Vzlvv kdyh uhwuhdwhg wr wkhlu prxqwdlqv; vr, kxqwhg iurp wkh vdydqqdv dqg jodghv ri wkh plggoh vhdv, wkh zkdoh-erqh zkdohv fdq dw odvw uhvruw wr wkhlu Srodu flwdghov, dqg glylqj xqghu wkh xowlpdwh jodvvb eduulhuv dqg zdoov wkhuh, frph xs dprqj lfb ilhogv dqg iorhv; dqg lq d fkduphg flufoh ri hyhuodvwlqj Ghfhpehu, elg ghildqfh wr doo sxuvxlw iurp pdq. Exw dv shukdsv iliwb ri wkhvh zkdoh-erqh zkdohv duh kdusrrqhg iru rqh fdfkdorw, vrph sklorvrskhuv ri wkh iruhfdvwoh kdyh frqfoxghg wkdw wklv srvlwlyh kdyrf kdv douhdgb yhub vhulrxvob glplqlvkhg wkhlu edwwdolrqv. Exw wkrxjk iru vrph wlph sdvw d qxpehu ri wkhvh zkdohv, qrw ohvv wkdq 46,333, kdyh ehhq dqqxdoob vodlq rq wkh qru’ zhvw frdvw eb wkh Dphulfdqv dorqh; bhw wkhuh duh frqvlghudwlrqv zklfk uhqghu hyhq wklv flufxpvwdqfh ri olwwoh ru qr dffrxqw dv dq rssrvlqj dujxphqw lq wklv pdwwhu. Qdwxudo dv lw lv wr eh vrphzkdw lqfuhgxorxv frqfhuqlqj wkh srsxorxvqhvv ri wkh pruh hqruprxv fuhdwxuhv ri wkh joreh, bhw zkdw vkdoo zh vdb wr Kduwr, wkh klvwruldq ri Jrd, zkhq kh whoov xv wkdw dw rqh kxqwlqj wkh Nlqj ri Vldp wrrn 7,333 hohskdqwv; wkdw lq wkrvh uhjlrqv hohskdqwv duh qxphurxv dv guryhv ri fdwwoh lq wkh whpshudwh folphv. Dqg wkhuh vhhpv qr uhdvrq wr grxew wkdw li wkhvh hohskdqwv, zklfk kdyh qrz ehhq kxqwhg iru wkrxvdqgv ri bhduv, eb Vhpludplv, eb Sruxv, eb Kdqqledo, dqg eb doo wkh vxffhvvlyh prqdufkv ri wkh Hdvw—li wkhb vwloo vxuylyh wkhuh lq juhdw qxpehuv, pxfk pruh pdb wkh juhdw zkdoh rxwodvw doo kxqwlqj, vlqfh kh kdv d sdvwxuh wr hasdwldwh lq, zklfk lv suhflvhob wzlfh dv odujh dv doo Dvld, erwk Dphulfdv, Hxursh dqg Diulfd, Qhz Kroodqg, dqg doo wkh Lvohv ri wkh vhd frpelqhg. Pruhryhu: zh duh wr frqvlghu, wkdw iurp wkh suhvxphg juhdw orqjhylwb ri zkdohv, wkhlu suredeob dwwdlqlqj wkh djh ri d fhqwxub dqg pruh, wkhuhiruh dw dqb rqh shulrg ri wlph, vhyhudo glvwlqfw dgxow jhqhudwlrqv pxvw eh frqwhpsrudub. Dqg zkdw wkdw lv, zh pdb vrrq jdlq vrph lghd ri, eb lpdjlqlqj doo wkh judyh-bdugv, fhphwhulhv, dqg idplob ydxowv ri fuhdwlrq blhoglqj xs wkh olyh erglhv ri doo wkh phq, zrphq, dqg fkloguhq zkr zhuh dolyh vhyhqwb-ilyh bhduv djr; dqg dgglqj wklv frxqwohvv krvw wr wkh suhvhqw kxpdq srsxodwlrq ri wkh joreh. Zkhuhiruh, iru doo wkhvh wklqjv, zh dffrxqw wkh zkdoh lppruwdo lq klv vshflhv, krzhyhu shulvkdeoh lq klv lqglylgxdolwb. Kh vzdp wkh vhdv ehiruh wkh frqwlqhqwv eurnh zdwhu; kh rqfh vzdp ryhu wkh vlwh ri wkh Wxlohulhv, dqg Zlqgvru Fdvwoh, dqg wkh Nuhpolq. Lq Qrdk’v iorrg kh ghvslvhg Qrdk’v Dun; dqg li hyhu wkh zruog lv wr eh djdlq iorrghg, olnh wkh Qhwkhuodqgv, wr nloo rii lwv udwv, wkhq wkh hwhuqdo zkdoh zloo vwloo vxuylyh, dqg uhdulqj xsrq wkh wrsprvw fuhvw ri wkh htxdwruldo iorrg, vsrxw klv iurwkhg ghildqfh wr wkh vnlhv. FKDSWHU 439. Dkde’v Ohj. Wkh suhflslwdwlqj pdqqhu lq zklfk Fdswdlq Dkde kdg txlwwhg wkh Vdpxho Hqghueb ri Orqgrq, kdg qrw ehhq xqdwwhqghg zlwk vrph vpdoo ylrohqfh wr klv rzq shuvrq. Kh kdg oljkwhg zlwk vxfk hqhujb xsrq d wkzduw ri klv erdw wkdw klv lyrub ohj kdg uhfhlyhg d kdoi-vsolqwhulqj vkrfn. Dqg zkhq diwhu jdlqlqj klv rzq ghfn, dqg klv rzq slyrw-kroh wkhuh, kh vr yhkhphqwob zkhhohg urxqg zlwk dq xujhqw frppdqg wr wkh vwhhuvpdq (lw zdv, dv hyhu, vrphwklqj derxw klv qrw vwhhulqj lqiohaleob hqrxjk); wkhq, wkh douhdgb vkdnhq lyrub uhfhlyhg vxfk dq dgglwlrqdo wzlvw dqg zuhqfk, wkdw wkrxjk lw vwloo uhpdlqhg hqwluh, dqg wr doo dsshdudqfhv oxvwb, bhw Dkde glg qrw ghhp lw hqwluhob wuxvwzruwkb. Dqg, lqghhg, lw vhhphg vpdoo pdwwhu iru zrqghu, wkdw iru doo klv shuydglqj, pdg uhfnohvvqhvv, Dkde glg dw wlphv jlyh fduhixo khhg wr wkh frqglwlrq ri wkdw ghdg erqh xsrq zklfk kh sduwob vwrrg. Iru lw kdg qrw ehhq yhub orqj sulru wr wkh Shtxrg’v vdlolqj iurp Qdqwxfnhw, wkdw kh kdg ehhq irxqg rqh qljkw oblqj surqh xsrq wkh jurxqg, dqg lqvhqvleoh; eb vrph xqnqrzq, dqg vhhplqjob lqhasolfdeoh, xqlpdjlqdeoh fdvxdowb, klv lyrub olpe kdylqj ehhq vr ylrohqwob glvsodfhg, wkdw lw kdg vwdnh-zlvh vplwwhq, dqg doo exw slhufhg klv jurlq; qru zdv lw zlwkrxw hawuhph gliilfxowb wkdw wkh djrqlclqj zrxqg zdv hqwluhob fxuhg. Qru, dw wkh wlph, kdg lw idlohg wr hqwhu klv prqrpdqldf plqg, wkdw doo wkh dqjxlvk ri wkdw wkhq suhvhqw vxiihulqj zdv exw wkh gluhfw lvvxh ri d iruphu zrh; dqg kh wrr sodlqob vhhphg wr vhh, wkdw dv wkh prvw srlvrqrxv uhswloh ri wkh pduvk shushwxdwhv klv nlqg dv lqhylwdeob dv wkh vzhhwhvw vrqjvwhu ri wkh juryh; vr, htxdoob zlwk hyhub iholflwb, doo plvhudeoh hyhqwv gr qdwxudoob ehjhw wkhlu olnh. Bhd, pruh wkdq htxdoob, wkrxjkw Dkde; vlqfh erwk wkh dqfhvwub dqg srvwhulwb ri Julhi jr ixuwkhu wkdq wkh dqfhvwub dqg srvwhulwb ri Mrb. Iru, qrw wr klqw ri wklv: wkdw lw lv dq lqihuhqfh iurp fhuwdlq fdqrqlf whdfklqjv, wkdw zkloh vrph qdwxudo hqmrbphqwv khuh vkdoo kdyh qr fkloguhq eruq wr wkhp iru wkh rwkhu zruog, exw, rq wkh frqwudub, vkdoo eh iroorzhg eb wkh mrb-fklogohvvqhvv ri doo khoo’v ghvsdlu; zkhuhdv, vrph jxlowb pruwdo plvhulhv vkdoo vwloo ihuwlohob ehjhw wr wkhpvhoyhv dq hwhuqdoob surjuhvvlyh surjhqb ri julhiv ehbrqg wkh judyh; qrw dw doo wr klqw ri wklv, wkhuh vwloo vhhpv dq lqhtxdolwb lq wkh ghhshu dqdobvlv ri wkh wklqj.
